snippet: The enthusiasm of investors for the new fund reflects the sense that private equity firms are poised to strike big deals — and mint money.
abstract: Dealbook Online; Blackstone Group raises $17 billion for its latest leveraged buyout fund in just seven months; Blackstone Capital Partners VII promises to be one of biggest raised by firm in its 30-year history.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The enthusiasm of investors for the new fund reflects the sense that private equity firms are poised to strike big deals — and mint money.

headline.main: Blackstone Said to Raise $17 Billion for Buyout Fund
